commands.name: package1 version create
commands.description: Create a first-generation package version in the release org.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

requiredFlags.name: --package-id
requiredFlags.description: ID of the metadata package (starts with 033) of which you’re creating a new version.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command

optionalFlags.name: --description
optionalFlags.description: Package version description.

optionalFlags.name: --version
optionalFlags.description: Package version in major.minor format, for example, 3.2.

optionalFlags.name: --managed-released
optionalFlags.description: Create a managed package version. To create a beta version, don’t include this parameter.

optionalFlags.name: --release-notes-url
optionalFlags.description: Release notes URL. This link is displayed in the package installation UI to provide release notes for this package version to subscribers.

optionalFlags.name: --post-install-url
optionalFlags.description: Post install URL. The contents of the post-installation instructions URL are displayed in the UI after installation of the package version.

optionalFlags.name: --installation-key
optionalFlags.description: Installation key for key-protected package (default: null).

optionalFlags.name: --wait
optionalFlags.description: Minutes to wait for the package version to be created (default: 2 minutes).

commands.name: package1 version create get
commands.description: Retrieve the status of a package version creation request.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command

commands.name: package1 version display
commands.description: Display details about a first-generation package version.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

requiredFlags.name: --package-version-id
requiredFlags.description: ID (starts with 04t) of the metadata package version whose details you want to display.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command

commands.name: package1 version list
commands.description: List package versions for the specified first-generation package or for the org.

requiredFlags.name: --target-org
requiredFlags.description: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command

optionalFlags.name: --package-id
optionalFlags.description: Metadata package ID (starts with 033) whose package versions you want to list. If not specified, shows all versions for all packages (managed and unmanaged) in the org.
